Name: gvSIG Mobile
Others: Full vectorial editing capabilities both GPS and hand-based, SRS support, custom forms for alphanumeric attributes, vector symbology, thematic legend. SDI client.

Name: gvSIG Mini
Others: OpenStreetMap data + other free tile services. Integration with Twitter, weather, Facebook, namefinder. Off-line.

Name: TouchGeo
Others: OSM, Google, Bing, MapQuest tile services, integrated with SQL Server and Dynamics CRM for read and write.
